summary: A young adopted boy, Dolfje, turns into a werewolf at his 7th birthday. Supported by his bigger brother and chased by a mysterious organisation he has to find out how to live a normal life.
cast: Ole Kroes|Maas Bronkhuyzen|Remko Vrijdag|Kim van Kooten|Joop Keesmaat|Trudy Labij|Nick Geest|Barbara Pouwels|Pim Muda|Lupa Ranti|Bianca Krijgsman|Kees Hulst|Ottolien Boeschoten|Niek van der Horst|Sieger Sloot|Luc Theeboom|René van 't Hof|Elske Falkena|Dewi Reijs|Java Siegertsz|Fons Merkies|Tamara Bos|Sofie Ott De Vries|Zinedin el Bouzghibati|Max Cligge|Pol Coronel|Twan van Tunen|Tygo Gernandt
title: Jacobo lobo
